name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed Ultimate Sith Edition

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/STAR WARS The Force Unleashed/SWTFU Launcher.exe

task.description: Running Star Wars The Force Unleashed setup
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/STAR WARS The Force Unleashed/SWTFU Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .NET 3.5 SP1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Running Star Wars The Force Unleashed setup
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
